channel.title: Rochester Regional Health Foundations - Most Recent News

item.title: Rob Sands and Constellation Brands Give $20M to Support New Critical Care Center
item.description: Rob Sands, his family and Constellation Brands have been long-standing allies of Rochester Regional Health.  We are pleased to announce that this partnership has again proven fruitful with a transformational gift of $20 million to fund the construction of the Sands-Constellation Center for Critical Care at Rochester General Hospital (RGH).  “My parents set a wonderful philanthropic…  read more →

item.title: Eastern Region Tastings Showcase Event Recap
item.description: On Saturday, October 29, the two Rochester Regional Health Eastern Region Hospital Foundations hosted the Eastern Region Tastings Showcase to benefit initiatives at both Clifton Springs Hospital & Clinic (CSH&C) and Newark-Wayne Community Hospital (NWCH). This unique event, held in a heated tent on the grounds of the historic Granger Homestead, featured culinary delights and eclectic…  read more →

item.title: Rochester Regional Health “Breaks Ground” on New Center
item.description: A ground breaking ceremony was held to publicly recognize the generous $5 million gift from the Riedman Foundation to support the construction of the new Riedman Health Center, a 76,000-square foot building at East Ridge Road and Goodman Street in Irondequoit. The building will be a state-of-the-art facility, providing our many community members convenient access to a variety of patient care…  read more →

item.title: Rochester Regional Health Teams Raise $15,000 for Breast Cancer Research
item.description: Another successful walk is in the books! Teams representing Rochester Regional Health raised over $15,000 towards breast cancer research as part of the American Heart Association’s Making Strides Against Breast Cancer walk. Over 12,000 people participated in the fundraiser at Frontier Field on Sunday. Rochester Regional ranked the second-highest out of 18 fundraising…  read more →

item.title: Riedman Foundation Gives $5 Million Toward New Health Center
item.description: Rochester Regional Health announced a $5 million gift from the Riedman Foundation to support an estimated $26 million facility designed to make healthcare more accessible to patients. The new state-of-the-art Riedman Health Center will be located in the Ridge-Goodman Plaza in Irondequoit as a destination for primary care, pediatrics, dental, behavioral health and more. Physical therapy and a blood…  read more →

item.title: Inspiring Hope One Step at a Time: Walk to End Alzheimer’s Recap
item.description: On Saturday, September 24, United Memorial Medical Center staff joined over 500 community members in Genesee County to help raise awareness of Alzheimer’s disease and other brain disorders.  Read more about this event at myrochealth.    read more →

item.title: Breast Cancer Awareness Month Events: #ROCYourPink
item.description: Get ready to #ROCYourPink  for Breast Cancer Awareness Month this October! Below are some of the many events planned in support of local breast cancer patients and the Rochester Regional Breast Center. Please check back frequently as we will be adding more events and details. Wear Pink Day | Thursday, October 13 Go ahead, get decked out from head-to-toe! Don’t forget to send your Pink…  read more →

item.title: Lipson Cancer Institute Opens at Unity Hospital Location
item.description: The Lipson Cancer Institute now offers outpatient hematology and medical oncology services at Unity Hospital. Patients and their families will have access to our highly-trained experts and personal care, in their own neighborhood, close to home. The new office features two exam rooms, six therapy bays, and free parking.  Read more at myrochealth.   read more →

item.title: Congratulations: Newark-Wayne Named Orthopedic Joint Center of Excellence by Joint Commission
item.description: Newark-Wayne Community Hospital has earned The Joint Commission’s Gold Seal of Approval® for its Orthopedic Knee and Hip Replacement program. Newark-Wayne now joins Rochester General, Unity, and United Memorial Medical Center as Rochester Regional Health’s fourth accredited Orthopedic Joint Center of Excellence.  Read more at myrochealth.  read more →

item.title: Physician and Board Member From Clifton Springs Hospital & Clinic Receives Prestigious Philanthropy Award
item.description: Congratulations to Clifton Springs Hospital & Clinic physician and board member, Dr. Sidney Sobel and his wife Barbara, for receiving the Rochester Community Foundation’s prestigious 2016 Philanthropy Award at the annual meeting and luncheon held at the Rochester Riverside Convention Center on Sept. 22, 2016.  Read more about this event at myrochealth.    read more →

item.title: Rochester Regional Health Brings 3D Mammography to Batavia Region
item.description: United Memorial Medical Center to provide new state-of-the-art mammography services to community. Beginning on April 21, Rochester Regional Health’s United Memorial Medical Center will offer 3D mammography and additional mammography services at its Jerome Center, 16 Bank Street. “There is nothing more important than easy access to compassionate service and high-quality care that you…  read more →

item.title: Rochester Regional Health Receives more than $47 million to Improve Health Care Delivery and Patient Care in Finger Lakes Region
